programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: An outlaw (Henry Fonda) working for a railroad magnate fights a stranger (Charles Bronson) for a New Orleans widow's (Claudia Cardinale) land.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: A marshal (Lee Van Cleef), an Eastern reporter and five ex-convicts rescue widows from Mexican bandits.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: A man and his wife move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem, (2023, Animated)
programme.desc: The Turtle brothers take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.

programme.title: Transformers One, (2024, Animated)
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teen taps his computer into the NORAD missile-defense system and plays a video game, "Global Thermonuclear War.".

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Dead soldiers from the '60s surface in the '90s as high-tech warriors reanimated by the U.S. government.

programme.title: Stargate, (1994, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A portal takes an Egyptologist (James Spader), a colonel (Kurt Russell) and a team of soldiers to another planet with pyramids, slaves and an alien ruler.

programme.title: Face/Off, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Event Horizon, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: Let the Devil In
programme.desc: In 1988, devout Catholic and loving mother was found murdered in her Jefferson, NJ home; investigators uncover satanic symbols and come to realize that her son is missing; was this crime the result of the occult or something far more close to home?

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers, (1956, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A couple (Kevin McCarthy, Dana Wynter) discover that plant-life pods from space are replacing ordinary citizens.

programme.title: The Bounty, (1984, Adventure)
programme.desc: Mate Fletcher Christian (Mel Gibson) leads a mutiny against his friend Lt. Bligh (Anthony Hopkins) on an 18th-century voyage to Tahiti.

programme.title: My Dead Boyfriend, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) goes on a manic quest to learn the truth about her boyfriend after she finds him dead on their couch.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Moonstruck, (1987, Romance)
programme.desc: An Italian-American widow (Cher), engaged to a reticent suitor, falls in love with his brother (Nicolas Cage).

programme.title: Orange County, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: A high schooler (Colin Hanks) tries to fix a mistake after his guidance counselor sends the wrong papers to Stanford University.

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Manhattan playboy (Eddie Murphy) gets a new corporate boss (Robin Givens), and she treats him the way he has always treated women.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2024, Musical)
programme.desc: A new student gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics. However, when she makes the misstep of falling for the queen bee's ex-boyfriend, she finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An aging irresponsible misfit (Paul Newman) falls in love with an unhappily married younger woman (Melanie Griffith).

programme.title: The Terminal, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Unauthorized to enter the United States, an Eastern European (Tom Hanks) befriends a flight attendant (Catherine Zeta-Jones) while living in a New York airport.

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: An insecure man (Will Ferrell) competes for the affection of his stepchildren when their freewheeling father (Mark Wahlberg) breezes back into town.

programme.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut, (1999, Animated)
programme.desc: Kyle, Stan and Cartman orchestrate a resistance to an imminent war between Canada and the United States.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Unseen, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Sam, a gas station clerk, receives a random call from Emily, a nearly blind woman who's running from her murderous ex in the woods. Using a phone, Sam becomes Emily's only chance for survival as she guides the terrified woman through a video call.

programme.title: French Girl, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: When his girlfriend gets swept away to Canada by a job offer from her ex, a hopeless romantic travels to her hometown, only to find himself out of his depth while trying to charm her hard-to-impress, French-speaking family.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: With a biting wit and brutal honesty, Kelsey Cook covers the gamut, from Brazilian waxing to career advice from her parents; rising comedian Kiry Shabazz theorizes about how a doctor's note is much more valuable than the constitution.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief, (1955, Thriller)
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar (Cary Grant) sees fireworks with an American heiress (Grace Kelly) on the Riviera.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: Let the Devil In
programme.desc: In 1988, devout Catholic and loving mother was found murdered in her Jefferson, NJ home; investigators uncover satanic symbols and come to realize that her son is missing; was this crime the result of the occult or something far more close to home?

programme.title: Better Man, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: The true story of the meteoric rise, dramatic fall, and remarkable resurgence of British pop superstar Robbie Williams.

programme.title: Barbershop: The Next Cut, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: With the barbershop now coed, Calvin (Ice Cube), Eddie (Cedric the Entertainer) and the rest of the gang come up with a plan to save the neighborhood from crime.

programme.title: Madea's Witness Protection, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: Placed under federal protection in Madea's Southern home, a Wall Street banker and his dysfunctional family get a taste of the no-nonsense matriarch's special brand of tough love.

programme.title: Kingpin, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: A one-handed salesman, an Amish farm boy and a pretty con artist pull bowling scams to get to a $1 million tournament in Reno.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In 1990s Miami, a gym manager (Mark Wahlberg) and his muscular accomplices (Dwayne Johnson, Anthony Mackie) kidnap a wealthy businessman and force him to sign over all his assets -- including cars and a luxurious mansion -- to them.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: New York stockbroker Jordan Belfort, who founded brokerage firm Stratton Oakmont while still in his early 20s, develops habits of wretched excess and corruption.

programme.title: Novocaine, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage. He fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: In the Land of Saints and Sinners, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: Hoping to leave his dark past behind him, former assassin Finbar Murphy leads a quiet life in a coastal Irish town. However, when terrorists show up, he must soon choose between exposing his secret identity and defending his friends and neighbors.

programme.title: Gorky Park, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Moscow detective's investigation of a bizarre triple murder leads him to run-ins with the KGB and an American tycoon.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: An ex-hockey player (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna (Moira Kelly) bicker as paired figure skaters shooting for the Olympics.

programme.title: Moonstruck, (1987, Romance)
programme.desc: An Italian-American widow (Cher), engaged to a reticent suitor, falls in love with his brother (Nicolas Cage).

programme.title: Radio Days, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A New York boy's (Seth Green) life and a cigarette girl's (Mia Farrow) story recall World War II-era radio.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Adventure)
programme.desc: The captain of the Pequod risks his life and crew in an obsessive quest to kill the legendary whale that maimed him.

programme.title: Dreamer: Inspired by a True Story, (2005, Children)
programme.desc: A racehorse trainer (Kurt Russell) and his daughter (Dakota Fanning) nurse a gravely injured filly back to health and aim for a slot in the Breeders' Cup Classic.

programme.title: Benny & Joon, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: An eccentric's (Johnny Depp) arrival complicates the lives of a protective brother (Aidan Quinn) and his mentally ill sister (Mary Stuart Masterson).

programme.title: Overboard, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A yachtsman's (Edward Herrmann) wife (Goldie Hawn) falls overboard, forgets who she is and becomes an Oregon carpenter's (Kurt Russell) mate.

programme.title: Notting Hill, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: A man's (Hugh Grant) life changes when an international star (Julia Roberts) walks into his bookshop.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: An ex-hockey player (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna (Moira Kelly) bicker as paired figure skaters shooting for the Olympics.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Bridge, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: A rich Midwestern lawyer (Paul Newman), his wife (Joanne Woodward) and their children grow apart in the World War II era.

programme.title: Intersection, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An architect (Richard Gere) on the brink of a car accident recalls troubles with his wife (Sharon Stone) and his mistress (Lolita Davidovich) in Vancouver, British Columbia.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Crime Story)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.desc: Two ice skaters (Christy Carlson Romano, Ross Thomas) develop a love-hate relationship while dreaming of Olympic glory.

programme.desc: A couple's (Sam Waterston, Tess Harper) two daughters catch the eye of their new teenage neighbor in 1957 Louisiana.

programme.desc: Bungling Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) once again seeks the Pink Panther diamond and maddens his boss (Herbert Lom).

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1992, Thriller)

programme.title: There's Something Wrong With the Children, (2023, Drama)

programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she‚Äôs convicted of murdering staged his own ‚Äúdeath‚Äù and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him‚Äìand that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: 48 Hrs., (1982, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Nolte is a rough-edged cop after two vicious cop-killers. He can't do it without the help of smooth Murphy, who is serving time for a half-million dollar robbery.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow II [Cantonese-Language Version], (1987, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: A restauranteur teams up with a police officer and his ex-con brother to avenge the death of a friend's daughter.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III [Cantonese-Language Version], (1989, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: A man travels from China to Vietnam, on the brink of war with America, to retrieve his uncle and cousin but find complications when he falls in love with a female gangster with a dangerous ex.

programme.title: Ashfall, (2019, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: In the face of a disaster that will engulf both North and South Korea, a mission is put into action to stop a super volcanic eruption.

programme.title: The Man Standing Next: The Assassination of a President, (2020, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: The untold story of the Korean Central Intelligence Agency's political scheming in the 1970s is brought to vivid life in this powerfully acted drama.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration, (2022, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: After a terror incident occurs mid-flight, a passenger jet declares an emergency.

programme.title: Hard Boiled [Cantonese-Language Version], (1992, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Mo' Money, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: You can never be too rich...or too funny. Comedian Damon Wayans brings his rogue's gallery of outrageous characters to this action-filled comedy about a con artist who tries to go straight, but keeps getting pulled in the wrong direction.

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne (Mike Myers) now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: So I Married an Axe Murderer, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Comedy sensation Mike Myers stars with Nancy Travis in this hatchet-driven romantic comedy about a wedlock-shy coffee house poet who finally meets the perfect woman. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne (Mike Myers) now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Adventure)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: The Long Goodbye, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Under the inimitable direction of Robert Altman, Elliot Gould stars as the laid-back, legendary private eye Philip Marlowe investigating a mysterious murder. Also stars Sterling Hayden and Nina Van Pallandt.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Dillinger, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: An account of the notorious gangster, John Dillinger, from midway through his bank-robbing career up until his final shootout outside the Biograph Theatre.

programme.title: Force 10 From Navarone, (1978, Military & War Action)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After unlocking Akiza's psychic powers, Sayer sets his sights on using them to get even with the Dark Signers for destroying the Arcadia Movement.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei, Jack and Crow face off against Goodwin in the ultimate Shadow Duel showdown.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the safety of the world hanging in the balance, Yusei, Jack and Crow look to tip the scales in their favor by setting their sights on Goodwin's Earthbound Immortal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points running on empty, Yusei looks to rev it up one last time in order to defeat Goodwin and save the world from the destructive powers of the King of the Netherworld!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: A mysterious new threat arrives on the scene in New Domino City, forcing Yusei to take to the streets and track down a rogue Turbo Duelist known as The Ghost.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei must figure out a way to take down Ghost's Meklord Emperor Wisel before Wisel's special ability throws his game and his runner into a tailspin.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Vice Chancellor Rudolph Heitmann threatens to expel all the members of Leo and Luna's class from Duel Academy, Yusei attempts to teach the teacher a valuable lesson by challenging the Vice Chancellor to a duel to keep his friends in school.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Crow is asked to convince an old friend of Martha's to move into her retirement home, Crow decides to tackle the task by challenging the old man to a trash-talking junkyard duel. Can Crow convince the old man to relocate?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When a loan shark starts sinking his teeth into New Domino City, Jack decides to reel in this money-grubbing menace for good by putting his most prized possessions on the line in a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Leo and Luna decide to go exploring a nearby forest rumored to be haunted by wicked spirits, they soon discover that the rumors are all too real when a mysterious boy traps Luna in his house and challenges Leo to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei wakes up to find himself trapped in the back of a big rig with a bump on his head and no way out. After a mysterious tip leads Akiza to Yusei's location, the two friends soon find themselves Turbo Dueling an unfamiliar foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Sherry races on, Sherry reveals some shocking secrets about the upcoming World Racing Grand Prix. Meanwhile, Akiza begins to gain a new understanding and appreciation for Turbo Dueling while riding shotgun to Yusei.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Before heading out to the event of the year - The World Racing Grand Prix Gala - Yusei challenges Jack to a Turbo Duel in the hopes of finding a new dueling strategy that doesn't involve the use of Synchro Monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: A mysterious duelist named Vizor offers to show Yusei a new dueling strategy known as The Synchro Solution.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Akiza goes to get her Turbo Dueling license, but before she can drive off into the sunset, she first has to out-duel, out-maneuver and out-smart one of Sector Security's finest for her final exam.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After a string of Duel Runner thefts has New Domino City on high alert, Jack Atlas decides to take justice into his own hands and ventures out in search of those responsible.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When a mysterious new student gives Luna a-one-of-a-kind Duel Board, Leo, trusting his instincts, steps up and tries to pull a 180 on their friendship.
programme.sub-title: Dawn of the Duel Board: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the Duel Board battle between Leo, Luna and the mystery duelist continues, Leo soon realizes that their mysterious opponent is actually an all-too-familiar friend.
programme.sub-title: Dawn of the Duel Board: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack and Crow set out to find a restless Yusei - hoping to ease his mind and reinforce the friendship they share by Turbo Dueling down memory lane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: A mysterious amnesiac helps Yusei build a new engine program for his Runner, but before they can test it out, a make-up-wearing, noodle-eating crook runs off with the file.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei and the gang trail Lazar to the local mall hoping to reacquire the engine design program that this window-shopping, noodle-eating crook stole from them.
programme.sub-title: Get With the Program: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei and Lazar are trapped in a warehouse where their only chance of escaping is if Yusei can outduel a Guard Bot whose CPU has been uploaded with all of Yusei's battle techniques.
programme.sub-title: Get With the Program: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being charged with crimes he didn't commit, Jack Atlas scrambles to uncover the truth before his friends and fans turn their back on him for good.
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Jack Atlas on the run, Yusei and Crow set out in search of their pal, hoping to clear his good name before bad turns to worse.
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Zora's stubborn son Leon suddenly returns home, Crow picks a duel with him to help him realize that the ongoing quarrel he has with his mother is much ado about nothing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Yusei heads to a tumbleweed town at the request of some locals, he quickly finds himself in the middle of two feuding families - with his old friend Kalin right there with him!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Yusei challenges Kalin to a duel, he hopes to save his old acquaintance from a terrible fate. However, the dueling gets dicey when it becomes clear that Kalin doesn't necessarily want to be saved!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As Yusei continues to duel his best to save Kalin from a most unhappy ending, he suddenly finds himself double crossed by his supposed allies and in desperate need of some saving of his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being double crossed and sent to the mines by his supposed allies, Yusei hatches a plan to escape. Can Yusei find a way out, or will he and Kalin be forced to work the mines forever?
programme.sub-title: The Race to Escape: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: It's a high-speed minecart chase as Kalin and Yusei scramble to rescue Sergio's family from the clutches of the Crash Town mine. When Lawton and his goons gain up on the fleeing family, things take a heartbreaking turn.
programme.sub-title: The Race to Escape: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The sinister Lawton has captured West and Nico and gained control of Crash Town, but Yusei and Kalin have no intention of letting him get away with it. It's the ultimate showdown as the dueling duo confront Lawton in a winner-takes-all battle.
programme.sub-title: Clash at Crash Town: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the clash between Lawton, Yusei and Kalin comes to a climactic close, Yusei and Kalin must figure out a way to defeat Lawton before his deck destroys their dreams of freeing everyone in the mines.
programme.sub-title: Clash at Crash Town: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Sherry breaks into a city building in search of answers about a very special duel card, she finds a lot more than she bargained for.

programme.title: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet is Formed!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World

programme.title: While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy's appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto's Great Adventure!

programme.title: The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill's group hides a terrible secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!

programme.title: Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill's assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!

programme.title: Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill's self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!

programme.title: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!

programme.title: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard's Son Appears!

programme.title: Finally scaling the elephant's back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!

programme.title: Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant's back, but he's treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!

programme.title: Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differences‚Ä¶ And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!

programme.title: Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy's loose lips get them into trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!

programme.title: Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!

programme.title: Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack's amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!

programme.title: Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren't able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time Limit Closes in! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!

programme.title: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack's pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom's Assassins!

programme.title: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can't be refused!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!

programme.title: Sanji's dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom's crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To My Buds! Sanji's Farewell Note!

programme.title: There's only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend's disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Let's Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!

programme.title: Luffy hatches a plan to help Sanji, but he'll have to go alone to avoid an all-out war with Big Mom. Meanwhile, Kin'emon and Kanjuro finally arrive at Zou, unwittingly setting the stage for the Minks' thirst for revenge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy's Decision! Sanji on the Brink of Quitting!

programme.title: The samurai have landed! And they make their way into the country of Zou unaware of the welcome they will receive by the Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Volatile Situation! The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai!

programme.title: Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!

programme.title: The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!

programme.title: The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!

programme.title: More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed - and the samurai propose an alliance to help topple Kaido! But Luffy's response will shock the crew... and force the young daimyo to take responsibility!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Vow Between Two Men! Luffy and Kozuki Momonosuke!

programme.title: Dogstorm and Cat Viper share their story of being on the journey with Oden and Roger but are interrupted by Nami who is concerned about the sea route. Meanwhile, Jack is plotting to bring down the Mokomo Dukedom again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Journey! The Dog and the Cat and the Pirate King!

programme.title: The plans are set! The Straw Hats divide and conquer, one group heading to save Sanji, the others to the Land of Wano! But in the final moments before their departure, the tremendous elephant island begins to quake!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Returns! The Invincible Jack's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: After being aggressively attacked by Jack's fleet, the monstrous Zunesha comes to life and beckons to those on its back! But can the Straw Hats understand its cry? And realize in time what the elephant island needs from them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle to Defend Zou! Luffy and Zunesha!

programme.title: With the skirmish with Jack now over, the Straw Hats move on to trying to bandage the great elephant's wounds! But just as the whole island puts the plan into action, unseen danger lurks on horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Zunesha! The Straw Hat's Rescue Operation!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy's team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Saying Goodbye and Descending from the Elephant! Setting Out to Take Back Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy's team sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji! But they didn't realize there is one more crewmember than they have bargained for!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Princess Vivi and Princess Shirahoshi!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4

programme.desc: During the Cold War, a CIA operative (Scott Shepherd) recruits New York lawyer James Donovan (Tom Hanks) to negotiate a prisoner exchange for captured U.S. pilot Francis Gary Powers (Austin Stowell).

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: Love and Monsters (2020)
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an epic, 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Crusades (2023)
programme.desc: Three friends set out for one last great weekend while dodging authority, love affairs, and violent foes.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm (2005)
programme.desc: Itinerant con men (Matt Damon, Heath Ledger) become caught in a real fairy tale after several maidens disappear in an enchanted forest.

programme.title: Sahara (2005)
programme.desc: A treasure hunter (Matthew McConaughey) and his sidekick (Steve Zahn) join forces with a doctor (Penelope Cruz) to search for a Confederate ship in Africa.

programme.title: Red (2010)
programme.desc: Retired CIA agents (Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich) reassemble for survival after the agency sends assassins to silence them and the secrets they carry.

programme.title: Face/Off (1997)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction (1994)
programme.desc: Two hit men (John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson), a boxer, a crime boss and others meet their fates over the course of two days.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail (2020)
programme.desc: Indebted to a mobster, a desperate producer tries to "accidentally" kill an aging movie star for an insurance scam. However, he soon begins to realize that the film theyre shooting is a masterpiece in the making.

programme.title: Wolves of War (2022)
programme.desc: During World War II, a decorated British officer leads Allied commandos across enemy lines to rescue an American scientist held hostage by the Nazis.

programme.title: The Uninvited (2009)
programme.desc: A ghost prompts a lethal battle of wills between a mans new fiancee (Elizabeth Banks) and his two daughters (Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel), one of whom has just returned from a mental ward.

programme.title: Good Boy (2022)
programme.desc: Sigrid thinks shes met the perfect match in Christian, but theres one catch: he lives with a man who acts like his pet dog. Trying to be open-minded, she continues the relationship but soon notices an insidious undertone to Christian.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: Just Another Immigrant: Romesh at the Greek
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan, a successful comedian in England, moves his entire family to Los Angeles to make it as a comedian in America; he then takes the drastic step of performing his first ever U.S. stand-up show at the historic Greek Theatre.

programme.title: Breathe (2024)
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Mayas husband.

programme.title: The Parallax View (1974)
programme.desc: A reporters investigation into a political assassination reveals a nationwide network of trained killers.

programme.title: The Last Exorcism Part II (2013)
programme.desc: Unable to remember the horrific events of her past, Nell Sweetzer (Ashley Bell) tries to rebuild her life in New Orleans. However, a demonic force soon returns with sinister plans for her.

programme.title: Case 39 (2009)
programme.desc: A social worker (Renee Zellweger) saves a girl (Jodelle Ferland) from abusive parents but finds there is more to the child than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Return (2024)
programme.desc: After 20 years away, Odysseus washes up on the shores of Ithaca. The king finds much has changed since he left to fight in the Trojan War. No longer the mighty warrior his people remember, Odysseus must face his past to save his family.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow (1999)
programme.desc: Constable Ichabod Crane is sent to the village of Sleepy Hollow, where a headless horseman is leaving a trail of decapitated bodies.

programme.title: The Ring (2002)
programme.desc: A journalist (Naomi Watts) investigates the mystery behind a bizarre videotape that brings death after seven days to all who view it.

programme.title: Angel Heart (1987)
programme.desc: A satanic figure (Robert De Niro) sends a private eye (Mickey Rourke) to 1955 New Orleans, home of a voodoo priestess (Lisa Bonet).

programme.title: Sexterior Motives (2025)
programme.desc: Aurora is a femme fatale who finds herself in a twisted tale of passion and betrayal. Driven by lust, Jessica and Tony attempt to ruin Auroras husband but when Auroras lover, Connie, thwarts their plan, all chaos ensues..

programme.title: Allied (2016)
programme.desc: World War II operative Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) falls for French Resistance fighter Marianne Beausejour (Marion Cotillard) during a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Reunited in London, a devastating secret tests their love and loyalty to each other.
